title: Green Darkness
description: The year was 1968......The country was England.            Richard Marsdon had brought his new bride, Celia, to the family home, Medfield Place. They were young and very much in love.           But Richard and Celia were not only of this time. They had lived and loved before--in another world--in sixteenth-century England.           And their love had been tragically doomed. Was their new love destined for the same fate? GREEN DARKNESS -- a spellbinding story of a great love caught in an evil web of mysticism and witchcraft -- of a threatening past that reached across centuries to change the present.
author: Anya Seton
